name: Super Aspen
description:
It's a cold world. How long can you escape the growing snowball behind you? 

Use mouse or keyboard to move. Avoid trees and rocks, they will slow you down. The snowball will crush you if you can't keep up, so just keep skiing forever.

Made from scratch with HTML5 and Javascript for #RemakeJam. Read the postmortem on my blog.

Based on a TI-82 game I made over 20 years ago.  Here's what the original looked like..
